mainHero.title: Are you a student athlete or a mindful coach?
mainHero.description: MindfulPerformance accurately matches student-athletes with certified mindfulness coaches.

items.title: For Student Athletes
items.description: Who are struggling with performance anxiety, low confidence, and stress that holds them back from reaching their full potential.

items.title: For Mindful Coaches
items.description: Who are looking to streamline their path to expanding their clientele and scaling their coaching.

reviews.title: Don't just take our word for it! See what student-athletes and mindfulness coaches are saying about Mindful Performance.
reviews.subtitle: We conducted extensive research and talked to numerous college athletes and mindfulness coaches to understand their needs and preferences. Here's what we discovered:

items.title: Student-Athletes
items.description: 8/10 of student-athletes expressed a strong need for access to flexible and convenient mindfulness coaching sessions

items.title: Mindfulness Coaches
items.description: 9/10 mindfulness coaches surveyed expressed a keen interest in joining Mindful Performance.

atheletefeatures.subtitle: How does it Benefit the Student Athlete?
atheletefeatures.description: For student-athletes striving for excellence in all aspects of life, Mindful Performance offers expert mindfulness coaching with flexible, on-demand, personalized guidance to help you:

items.name: Manage Stress
items.description: Manage stress and anxiety to perform at your best under pressure with unwavering confidence.

items.name: Build Resilience
items.description: Develop unshakable resilience to bounce back stronger from setbacks.

items.name: Focus
items.description: Master your mindset to stay focused, driven, and in control.

items.name: Achieve Greatness
items.description: Cultivate a champion's mentality to embrace challenges and achieve greatness.

coachfeatures.subtitle: How does it Benefit the Mindful Coaches?
coachfeatures.description: For mindfulness coaches, MindfulPerformance offers a streamlined path to expanding clientele and making a meaningful impact by helping you with.

items.name: Expand Reach
items.description: Effortlessly connect with and expand your clientele through our one-stop client hub.

items.name: Grow Business
items.description: Leverage analytics to assess session impacts and strategically grow your business.

items.name: CRM Tools
items.description: Streamline client management with our specialized CRM tools.

items.name: Enhance Sessions
items.description: Enhance your sessions with our private and secure client journaling feature.
